abstract: Amazon.com courted Zappos.com for years before ultimately reaching a deal to buy the online shoe retailer, according to a regulatory filing detailing the transaction.
snippet: Amazon.com courted Zappos.com for years before ultimately reaching a deal to buy the online shoe retailer, according to a regulatory filing detailing the transaction.
lead_paragraph: Update | July 30 3:26 p.m.  Removed some information about ownership of stakes in Zappos because the math was wacky. Thanks for the heads-up, Jojo.
